title: 10/3/17 - Responding to Violence with... Violence?
description:
Responding to violence with...violence?... We find out the final count of dead and injured at the concert late Sunday night... Chemicals, ammunition, and a camera were found in the gunman’s car and hotel room... More supplies were found in his home in Nevada... More celebrity responses…’I wish libertarian billionaires ran the Republican Party’… We are all about solutions... Vicente Fox, president of Mexico, is offering just that... We go over other solutions than gun control... Alex Jones has more crazy to share.

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
